title: [K-12] Network-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Scaling Educational Reform Models

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in educational policy and organizational management, project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Focused on expert teams collaboratively developing and executing educational model scaling strategies, including real-world case analyses using digital tools

learning_goals: Identify and explain three core elements of networked organizations for scaling educational models
Write a project report analyzing the impact of policy environments and organizational capacities on model scaling
Present a networked operational strategy based on a common instructional design framework applied to real-world cases
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
